切.definition: definitely; absolutely (not); (scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right.; Tut!; to grind; (bound form) close to; (bound form) eager; to correspond to; (used to indicate that the fanqie 反切[fan3 qie4] system should be applied to the previous two characters)

切·格瓦拉.definition: Ernesto Che Guevara (1928-1967), Cuban Revolution leader

切中.definition: to hit the target (esp. in argument); to strike home

切中時弊.definition: to hit home on the evils of the day (idiom); fig. to hit a current political target; to hit the nub of the matter

切中時病.definition: to hit the target where it hurts (idiom); fig. to hit home; to hit the nail on the head (in an argument)

切中要害.definition: to hit the target and do real damage (idiom); fig. to hit where it hurts; fig. to hit home; an argument that hits the nail on the head

切入.definition: to cut into; to penetrate deeply into (a topic, area etc); (sports) (soccer etc) to penetrate (the defenses of the opposing team); (cinema) to cut (to the next scene)

切切.definition: urgently; eagerly; worried; (urge sb to) be sure to; it is absolutely essential to (follow the above instruction)

切口.definition: slang; argot; private language used as secret code

切合.definition: to fit in with; to suit; appropriate

切合實際.definition: practical; corresponding to reality; geared to practical situations

切尼.definition: Cheney (name); Richard B. "Dick" Cheney (1941-), US Republican politician, vice-president 2001-2008

切忌.definition: to avoid as taboo; to avoid by all means

切成.definition: to cut up (into pieces); to slice; to carve; to dice; to shred

切換.definition: to switch over; to switch modes or data streams; to cut (to a new scene)

切片.definition: to slice; slice; thin section of a specimen (for microscopic examination)

切片檢查.definition: slide examination; microscopic examination of thin section of specimen as part of biopsy

切特豪斯學校.pinyin: Qie1 te4 hao2 si1 xue2 xiao4

切盼.definition: to look forward eagerly to sth; keenly desired

切磋.definition: to compare notes; to learn from one another

切磋琢磨.definition: lit. cutting and polishing (idiom); fig. to learn by exchanging ideas or experiences

切腹.definition: harakiri (formal Japanese: seppuku), a samurai's suicide by disemboweling

切莫.definition: you must not; Please don't...; be sure not to; on no account (do it)

切診.definition: (TCM) pulse feeling and palpitation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]

切除.definition: to excise; to cut out (a tumor)

切音.definition: to indicate the phonetic value of a word using other words

切骨之仇.definition: bitter hatred; hatred that cuts to the bone

切齒腐心.definition: to detest sth or sb to the utmost extreme (idiom)
